page.title: 15PETS AND ANIMALS.
page.content: Animals and pets play a large part in peoples lives in Chasetown. A majority of people keep pets and the most popular pet was a dog. The most popular breed of dog was a collie and female animals seemed to be favoured, perhaps because people think they are better behaved. Many people say they keep pets for company and protection. On animals in general there were a variety of other types of pets but there was a view against keeping exotic pets, such as snakes. Many people think that dogs should be closely controlled more than they are now. A majority of people asked were in favour of higher licence fees. Most people thought it cruel to use animals in scientific experiments but saw a value if it was to help cure disease, but not for the sake of vanity.
